**2022-09-21 / @rsc, @griesemer, @andybons, @aclements**

**Accepted**

- **errors: add support for wrapping multiple errors** [#53435](https://go.dev/issue/53435)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime: add 'created by goroutine number' to stack traces** [#38651](https://go.dev/issue/38651)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/crypto/cryptobyte: non allocating AddUint\*LengthPrefixed and AddASN1 API** [#54059](https://go.dev/issue/54059)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/sync/errgroup: propagate panics and Goexits through Wait** [#53757](https://go.dev/issue/53757)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **runtime/race: add const Enabled** [#36477](https://go.dev/issue/36477)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **runtime: add parameters to recover to only return specific types** [#50424](https://go.dev/issue/50424)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **go/ast: record start and end of file in File.FileStart, File.FileEnd** [#53202](https://go.dev/issue/53202)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime: add HeapMarked to MemStats** [#51966](https://go.dev/issue/51966)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
